Access Default Dashboards

Access various pre-existing PW EMS Monitoring and Reporting dashboards that display system component status information, access network Key Performance Indicators (KPIs), and system performance information.

  1. In the navigation bar, select the Dashboard icon .
  2. From the Dashboard pop-up menu, click Manage.
    The Dashboards window displays with a list of default dashboards that can be managed and adjusted as needed. For example:
  3. Scroll down the list of default dashboards, and select any of the default dashbords that you want to view or modify, which are described in the following table:

    Dashboard Type

    		 Folder Name

    Folder Description
    Long Term Evolution (LTE) access node cell Dashboards for measuring 4G cell KPIs for cell availability, Radio Resource Control (RRC) Scheduling Requests (SRs), E-UTRAN Radio Access Bearer (ERAB) SRs, LTE SRs, and so on. LTE_KPI View all received LTE cell KPIs that are received with no time aggegation.
    LTE_KPI_Hourly View received LTE cell KPIs measured on an hourly basis.
    LTE_KPI_Daily View received LTE cell KPIs measured on an daily basis.
    LTE_KPI_Weekly View received LTE cell KPIs measured on an weekly basis.
    LTE KPI Table View received LTE cell KPIs measured using all time aggregation options.
    Global System for Mobile communications (GSM) access node Dashboards for measuring 2G cell KPIs for cell availability, call setup success rate, Traffic Channel TCH congestion rate and drop rate, and so on. GSM_KPI View all received GSM cell KPIs that are received with no time aggegation.
    GSM_KPI_Hourly View received GSM cell KPIs measured on an hourly basis.
    GSM_KPI_Daily View received GSM cell KPIs measured on an daily basis.
    GSM_KPI_Weekly View received GSM cell KPIs measured on an weekly basis.
    LTE KPI Table View received LTE cell KPIs measured using all time aggregation options.
    Resource Dashboards to monitor the health and performance of access nodes. VENB Instance Network Health Monitor View the Health Monitor for the LTE network.
    VBSC-VPCU Instance Network Health Monitor View the Health Monitor for the GSM network.
    VBBU Server Health Monitor View the Health Monitor for a vBBU server.
    HNG Server Health Monitor View the Health Monitor for an HNG server.
    Kubernetes Monitoring Dashboard View status information for a Kubernetes cluster.
    Clickhouse Performance Monitor Use a query to monitor Clickhouse backend Prometheus database performance.
    Alert Dashboards Alert Monitoring Shows all the alerts for a cluster, pod, and instance.
    Alert Dashboard for LTE Shows all LTE KPI thresholds by color code.
    Alert Dashboard for GSM Shows all KPI GSM thresholds by color code.
    Prometheus Dashboards Prometheus Alert Manager Shows alerts using the Prometheus Alertmanager component to view alerts sent by the Prometheus server.
    Kafka Metrics Shows the performance of the Kafka streaming platform.
Parent topic: About PW EMS Monitoring and Reporting
